divs: Sighting DetailsSee transcript included in report... See attached documents... First encounter 9 years ago (approximately) Second encounter 20 March at 12:14 local. First encounter coordinates: 27.79264N by 98.36935W elevation 468 feet Second encounter coordinates: 27.80522N by 98.41231W elevation 522 feet Notes: Consuelo Campos (2nd witness) refuses to testify. Elaine Clarke (1st witness) claims imprinting of mental image of a small grey.
